snippet.title: Manual Samuel Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Manual Samuel tells of the adventure of two unlikely friends on an epic journey of and for a lifetime.

After his untimely demise Sam is given a choice by Death:
Be tortured in hell for all eternity
OR
Live 24 hours manually.
With a choice like that, how could Sam refuse the latter?

Manual Samuel developed by Perfectly Paranormal and published by Curve Digital will be released on the 11th of October for PlayStation 4. And the 14th of October for Xbox One and Steam.
